articles.title: Johnson & Johnson to end sales of talc baby powder globally next year amid cancer lawsuits - USA TODAY
articles.description: J&J insists that the talc baby powder is safe and doesn’t cause cancer. But demand fell, and the product was removed in most of North America in 2020.
articles.content:
Johnson & Johnson is pulling baby powder containing talc worldwide next year after it did the same in the U.S. and Canada amid thousands of lawsuits claiming it caused cancer.
